sources.title: FATTY AND MINNIE-HE-HAW (1914) -- Roscoe Arbuckle, Minnie Devereaux, Minta Durfee
sources.description: FATTY AND MINNIE-HE-HAW (1914)  Starring: Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle, Minnie Devereaux, Minta Durfee, Josef Swickard, Harry McCoy, Joe Bordeaux, Frank Hayes, Slim Summerville Directed by Arbuckle Keystone Film Company  William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

metadata.Plot: Fatty steals a ride on a train, discovered, and put off in the middle of nowhere. He stumbles along over the hot desert and finally passes out. A very plump Indian woman finds him and takes him to her tepee, woos him and finally, in desperation, Fatty agrees to marry her. While the tribe is preparing for the marriage ceremony, Fatty attempts to escape but is caught.
metadata.Actors: Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Minnie Devereaux, Minta Durfee
